nodes.text: The Decimator Laboratory was a Galactic Republic laboratory on Eredenn used to house the control codes for the Decimator weapon during its testing. It was seized by Sev'rance Tann during the Clone Wars in the Battle of Eredenn. Tann stole a data droid from the laboratory which she took to Alaris Prime to finish unlocking the Decimators for the use of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
